thread.title: Call to legalise Segways to cut down road congestion
thread.title_full: Call to legalise Segways to cut down road congestion

title: Call to legalise Segways to cut down road congestion
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Call to legalise Segways to cut down ... Call to legalise Segways to cut down road congestion 4 hrs ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
The ACT government may look at extending Segway use on public land as part of a review into the success of the popular lakeside tours. The potential for a change to the ban on the transporters was raised after the family who brought Australia its first Segway rentals on public land called for the self-balancing machines to be legalised to help cut congestion. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
